question: Which country won the gold medal in women's volleyball at the 2016 Summer Olympics?
explanation: China won the gold medal in women's volleyball at the 2016 Summer Olympics. The women's tournament in volleyball at the 2016 Summer Olympics was the 14th edition of the event at an Olympic Games, organised by the world's governing body, the FIVB, in conjunction with the IOC. It was held in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil from 6 to 20 August 2016.
